TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataContractSerializer extends System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer

Docs.summary: Serializes and deserializes an instance of a type into an XML stream or document using a supplied data contract. This class cannot be inherited.
